detectors.description:
KittenRewards.notifyRewardAmount(uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/KittenRewards.sol#720-739) performs a multiplication on the result of a division:
	-rewardRate = reward.div(DURATION) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/KittenRewards.sol#725)
	-leftover = remaining.mul(rewardRate) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/KittenRewards.sol#728)
detectors.markdown:
[KittenRewards.notifyRewardAmount(uint256)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/KittenRewards.sol#L720-L739) performs a multiplication on the result of a division:
	-[rewardRate = reward.div(DURATION)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/KittenRewards.sol#L725)
	-[leftover = remaining.mul(rewardRate)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/KittenRewards.sol#L728)
